document_data.name: Helvur Tarnlar
document_data.mainbody: '''Helvur Tarnlar''' was a shopkeeper in [[Red Larch]] during the [[Elemental Evil]] crisis, who once provided a favor for the [[Lords' Alliance]].
document_data.Personality: Helvur was a snob. He disliked the local gossip and was always remarking that his hats were trendy in [[Silverymoon]] or that his boots were made for [[Neverwinter]] aristocrats, despite the fact that he had no idea about those places.
document_data.Relationship:
Helvur was married to [[Maegla]] and ran his clothing shop with her.

The Tarnlars had at this time four children, two boys and two girls, aged between 7 and 10 years old, who were known to play in and around the ravine by [[Lance Rock]] outside of Red Larch.
